story_teamrocket_01_19000/2401_1201_0200:
Yo! You made it! We finally got this
dude cornered.
story_teamrocket_01_19000/2401_1201_0300: Fwahaha! Cornered? You’re mistaken, I’m afraid.
story_teamrocket_01_19000/2401_1201_0400: You were lured here... By me and Mewtwo.
story_teamrocket_01_19000/2401_1201_0500:
Pfft! Gimme a break! Who’s the one who ran
away the moment we showed up?
story_teamrocket_01_19000/2401_1201_0600:
Give it up already, and hand over Professor
Bellis’s research data.
story_teamrocket_01_19000/2401_1201_0700:
I’ll gladly return it to you... I have no need for
it now.
story_teamrocket_01_19000/2401_1201_0900:
I’ve already read through it all. Fascinating
data, really.
story_teamrocket_01_19000/2401_1201_1100: I will put it to good use!
story_teamrocket_01_19000/2401_1201_1300: Let me show you the true power of sync stones!
story_teamrocket_01_19000/2401_1201_1400: Yes, this is turning out nicely...
story_teamrocket_01_19000/2401_1201_1500:
Make it stop, Giovanni! This is getting out
of control!
story_teamrocket_01_19000/2401_1201_1600: Nonsense. This is going exactly as I planned.
story_teamrocket_01_19000/2401_1201_2100:
It appears the amount of energy we drew out was
too much to handle, even for a Pokémon as
powerful as Mewtwo.
story_teamrocket_01_19000/2401_1201_2200:
If you’ll excuse me, I have some business to
attend to.
story_teamrocket_01_19000/2401_1201_2300:
I’d like to witness just how strong my partner
Pokémon has become.
story_teamrocket_01_19000/2401_1201_2500: Wait, Misty. Red and I can go after Giovanni.
story_teamrocket_01_19000/2401_1201_2600: Could you guys try to figure out what’s going on?
story_teamrocket_01_19000/2401_1201_2800:
The rest of us should stay together as
we investigate.
story_teamrocket_01_19000/2401_1201_2900: I have a bad feeling about this...
